title: Russell Peters Reveals Why He Was Never on Letterman
description:
Full video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xRGkr0LGZDA&t=9s

“I would either kill or bomb. There was no middle ground.”

In this fun clip of the Jordan Peterson Podcast, Jordan, Mikhaila, and guest Russell Peters talk about his beginnings in comedy, being a Canadian Indian comic, transition to fame, his travels all around the world, local comedy club pay practices, being randomly recognized on the street, talking to people, navigating the industry, sticking his foot in his mouth, failure and much more.

 #JordanPeterson #JordanPetersonPodcast #RussellPeters #Comedy #StandupComedy
